    Subclasses of ColumnRepresentation in au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.column
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DecimalRepresentation
    Describes a representation of a decimal value, which includes: The value itself The original scale of the value
    class 
    DefaultRepresentation
    Describes a representation where collections of values are represented as arrays in the dataset.
    class 
    UnsupportedRepresentation
    Used when a collection does not have a representation that can be expressed within a Spark dataframe.
